TopicTitle: Well i AM NO NEW MEMBER TO KSP but i am new to the fourms...

Articles.Content: So yea if you guys would give me tips to navagating etc. It would really help

I'm afraid "navigating" is a pretty big subject. What was it you were trying to do? Get to orbit? To Mun?

This may be of some help: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/30238-How-to-Read-the-Navball

Navigating? What exactly are you trying to do?

Welcome anyway.

Maybe i can help a bit. It sure helps to have flightsim experience, the navball is vital.

I also learned women have more trouble in this, because they often have trouble "imagining" space and positional awareness.

This is no joke, men and women have that difference.
There is also the Wiki and it has links to tutorials. Or just go to YouTube and look for Scott Manley videos. Or ask specific questions in the forum.
